#summary One-sentence summary of this page.

= How to Try Out =

  # Install Eclipse SDK 3.4.1 or 3.5.0.
  # Download the corresponding patch file (one with matching version)
  # Run Eclipse as
{{{
Eclipse.exe -dev <jdt_patch_with_ohl_name>.jar
}}}
  # In the running Eclipse import java projects into your workspace from http://ohl.googlecode.com/svn/trunk/samples/ru.spb.rybin.ohl.v2.samples SVN URL. It should be a sample project and ohl_rt library project. One depends on another.
  # Try to play with it. Feel free to write me if you have thoughts or there are problems.
